sentences.sContent: Yes, it is like a triangle.
So, we have to find the area of the triangle.
sentences.sContent_eng: So, we have to find the area of the triangle.
sentences.sCn: 因此我们必须求出三角形的面积。

sentences.sContent: It can measure not only the sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, a sharp pulse but also can measure other characteristics of the signal wave.
sentences.sContent_eng: It can measure not only the sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, a sharp pulse but also can measure other characteristics of the signal wave.
sentences.sCn: 它不仅可以测量正弦波、方波、三角波、尖脉冲信号和其他具有周期特性的信号的频率，而且还可以测量它们的周期。

synos.tran: [数][昆][测]三角（形）；三角关系；三角形之物；三人一组

phrases.pCn: 三角形公理；三角不等式

words.tran: 由三角形组成的；有三角斑纹的
[测] 三角测量；三角形划分
把…分成三角形；使…成三角形；对…作三角测量

trans.tranOther: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles
